sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Page, Navbar, Link, NavLeft, NavRight, NavTitle, List, ListInput, Button, Block, Col, Row,f7 } from 'framework7-react'; const DoRegister = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formData = f7.form.convertToData(e.target) f7.dialog.alert(JSON.stringify(formData),"Authentication App") } export default () => ( User Authentication menu DoRegister(e)}> )
